Constructs a logger.

bot->logger->Close();

◆ Debug()

void discpp::Logger::Debug ( const std::string &  text)
inline

Logs to console or file, maybe even both in the debug severity.

bot->logger->Debug(LogTextColor::GREEN + "Got response from gateway: " + response.text);
// Output:
// [19:23:08] [DEBUG] Got response from gateway: {"d":null,"op":11,"s":null,"t":null}
Parameters
textThe text to log.
Returns
void

◆ Error()

void discpp::Logger::Error ( const std::string &  text)
inline

Logs to console or file, maybe even both in the error severity.

bot->logger->Error(LogTextColor::RED + "Got non-json response from gateway!");
// Output:
// [19:23:08] [ERROR] Got non-json response from gateway!
Parameters
textThe text to log.
Returns
void

◆ Info()

void discpp::Logger::Info ( const std::string &  text)
inline

Logs to console or file, maybe even both in the error severity.

bot->logger->Info(LogTextColor::GREEN + "Reconnected to gateway!");
// Output:
// [19:23:08] [INFO] Reconnected to gateway!
Parameters
textThe text to log.
Returns
void

◆ Warn()

void discpp::Logger::Warn ( const std::string &  text)
inline

Logs to console or file, maybe even both in the warn severity.

bot->logger->Warn(LogTextColor::YELLOW + "Bot has no permission to ban user");
// Output:
// [19:23:08] [WARN] Bot has no permission to ban user
Parameters
textThe text to log.
Returns
void
